name: dulcetly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is soft and pleasant to listen to: "Thank you," she murmured dulcetly into his ear. Some doves were cooing dulcetly from the rooftop. Related word
dulcet
More examplesFewer examplesThe woodwind instruments played dulcetly in the background.She sat at the piano, singing dulcetly.He was humming dulcetly to himself as he walked through the garden.We've all heard about Romeo and Juliet whispering dulcetly to each other about love.The birds were warbling dulcetly in the trees.
